scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=test && sequelize db:drop || true && sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate &&  jest  ./src/test --forceExit
scripts.test:coverage: export NODE_ENV=test && sequelize db:drop || true && sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate &&  jest  ./src/test --config jestconfig.json --forceExit --coverage && codecov -t 338d152d-2795-4932-8589-4d5771bf49e2
scripts.test:watch: export NODE_ENV=test && sequelize db:drop || true && sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate &&  jest  ./src/test --forceExit --coverage --watch
